paper.title: Adaptive-Attack Norm for Decorrelation and Super-Pseudorandomness
paper.abstract: In previous work, security results of decorrelation theory was based on the infinity-associated matrix norm. This enables to prove that decorrelation provides security against non-adaptive iterated attacks. In this paper we define a new matrix norm dedicated to adaptive chosen plaintext attacks.
